casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Javier R. MONGE. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016.

Glenn L. Formica, New Haven, in support of the petition.

Harry Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 36, 138 A.3d 450 (2016), is denied.
